Information.OverviewText:
Nestled around three beautiful lakes in Centre Ridge, Lakeside Apartments offers one- and two-bedroom luxury apartment homes. No matter which floor plan you choose, you'll find every amenity, every comfort and every chance to enjoy bright airy spaces expertly designed for maximum convenience.

Lakeside is built on 45 landscaped acres of rolling meadows and lakes. Whether you desire to ride bikes around the lakes, work out, swim in one of the three pools, enjoy the sun on one of our decks or relax in your spacious apartment, you'll love Lakeside Apartments. We also offer a variety of time-saving services and thoughtful extras. We have a clubhouse available for private parties and meetings, a car wash, regular community events and much more.
Information.OverviewTextStripped: Nestled around three beautiful lakes in Centre Ridge, Lakeside Apartments offers one- and two-bedroom luxury apartment homes. No matter which floor plan you choose, you'll find every amenity, every comfort and every chance to enjoy bright airy spaces expertly designed for maximum convenience. Lakeside is built on 45 landscaped acres of rolling meadows and lakes. Whether you desire to ride bikes around the lakes, work out, swim in one of the three pools, enjoy the sun on one of our decks or relax in your spacious apartment, you'll love Lakeside Apartments. We also offer a variety of time-saving services and thoughtful extras. We have a clubhouse available for private parties and meetings, a car wash, regular community events and much more.
Information.OverviewBullet1: Relax on 45 acres of beautifully landscaped grounds with three scenic lakes scattered throughout
Information.OverviewBullet2: Resident garden and ENERGI outdoor fitness stations
Information.OverviewBullet3: Stainless steel appliances and maple cabinetry
Information.NeighborhoodText:
Paint the Town

Enjoy living in close proximity to restaurants, parks and art galleries at the Lakeside Apartments.

  • Restaurants: Sweetwater Tavern, Bonefish Grill, Alto Plaza, Copper Canyon, Preet Palace, Ciao Osteria, Outback Steakhouse, Carrabba's Italian Grill, Charlie Chiang's, Ledo Pizza, Bangkok City Restaurant, Chipotle
  • Bars: Red Rock Café &Tequila Bar, Chasin' Tails, The Revolution Darts and Billiards, and Velocity Five Sports Restaurants & Bar
  • Spas: Valon Salon & Day Spa, Sully Nail Salon, Prestige Nail Salon, Elizabeth Arden Red Door
  • Hotels: Extended Stay America, Spring Hill Marriott Suites
  • Theaters: Centreville Multiplex Cinemas, Alliance Theatre
  • Art Galleries: Jung Fine Art Studio
  • Parks: Bull Run Regional Park, Cub Run Park, Arrowhead Park, Chalet Woods Park
  • Trails: Hemlock Overlook Regional Park

Getting Around

  • Metro: 13 miles south of Vienna Metro Station
  • Bus: Fairfax Connector, located at entrance to community, takes you directly to Vienna Metro stop
  • Airport: Dulles Airport
  • Train Station: Amtrak station
  • Major Highways/Roads: Located at intersection of Rts. 28 and 29, and 1 mile from I-66

Educate Yourself

  • Elementary School: Centre Ridge Elementary
  • Middle School: Liberty Middle School
  • High School: Centreville High School
  • Colleges/Universities: George Mason University, Northern Virginia Community College

Feature.Title: Lakeside Apartments
Feature.Description:
Welcome to Lakeside Apartments


Miles from the stress. Away from the bustle. Close to perfection.

Situated on 45 acres of beautifully landscaped grounds and bordered by peaceful lakes, life at Lakeside is an exceptional experience in the heart of Centreville. At Lakeside Apartments you’ll find the ideal home that is both spacious and contemporary, with features such as updated kitchens with stainless steel kitchen appliances, maple cabinetry, and beautiful flooring throughout. From a dip in a resort-inspired pool and a game of tennis, to socializing in a luxury clubhouse or reading a book by the lake; you’ll find life on the relaxing side of things. Located in the heart of Centreville in Fairfax County, there’s an array of shopping, dining, schools, and attractions nearby your home at Lakeside. You’ll be within easy access to Route 29 and I-66, just minutes from Dulles, and a short drive from downtown Washington D.C.

Escape to your new sanctuary at Lakeside Apartments.

Feature.Title: Features
Feature.Description:
• Upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances and maple cabinetry
  • Upgraded baths with maple cabinetry
  • Fireplaces available
  • Individual full-size washer/dryer in each residence
  • Frost-free freezer with ice maker
  • Vaulted ceilings available
  • Patios and balconies
  • Individual outside storage
  • Oversized closets
  • KemLam wood finished flooring available
  • Available high-speed Internet/digital cable
  • Verizon FiOS available

Amenities

  • Luxury clubhouses
  • Starbucks wireless café
  • Pet-friendly community
  • Dog park
  • Scenic lake views
  • Three pools
  • Tennis court, sports court and sand volleyball court
  • Playground area
  • Picnic and grilling area
  • 24-hour fitness center
  • Car-wash area
  • Available carports
  • Guest suite available for resident guests
  • Resident garden
  • ENERGI outdoor fitness stations
  • Complimentary weekly fitness classes
  • Complimentary doorstep trash service

Feature.Title: Services
Feature.Description:
From your first step across the threshold, you'll enjoy customer service that's second to none. Whether you need your plants watered, your pet cared for or an important package delivered to your door, consider it done. Bozzuto Management is committed to doing whatever it takes to meet your needs and exceed your expectations.

At Lakeside, our award-winning services include:

  • 24-hour emergency maintenance
  • Starbucks wireless café
  • Package-acceptance service
  • Maid-service referral
  • "Away from Home" service

For a luxurious home in Centreville, Virginia that’s surrounded by natural splendor, consider living at Lakeside Apartments. This pet-friendly community includes a long list of top amenities. Guests here enjoy three pools, a Starbucks wireless café, scenic views and a luxury clubhouse too. It’s also right by the Vienna Metro Station and Fairfax Connector stops, making it an ideal home for commuters. Don’t wait. Reach out to Bozzuto to start the leasing process on a dream apartment today.

Information.OverviewText: MetroPointe is more than an apartment community. It's a place where everyone blends in beautifully because everyone is unique. Where all are also united by a desire for urban convenience, contemporary design and modern living in one of the most vibrant communities in the D.C. metro area. Located right above the Wheaton Metro, but miles from the ordinary. Welcome to where you truly belong.
Information.OverviewTextStripped: MetroPointe is more than an apartment community. It's a place where everyone blends in beautifully because everyone is unique. Where all are also united by a desire for urban convenience, contemporary design and modern living in one of the most vibrant communities in the D.C. metro area. Located right above the Wheaton Metro, but miles from the ordinary. Welcome to where you truly belong.
Information.OverviewBullet2: An exceptional level of customer service
Information.OverviewBullet3: Directly above the Wheaton Metro (Red Line)
Information.NeighborhoodText:
Paint the Town

Wheaton is a dynamic neighborhood bustling with eclectic attractions. It's a community where your personal style and outlook are celebrated, as an increasing number of area residents are discovering every day. Conveniences are everywhere, from the Wheaton Metro (Red Line) downstairs to the many shopping malls, restaurants, markets and entertainment venues that are within minutes. MetroPointe is all about you. All the time. All the way.

  • Restaurants: Acapulco Mar-Y-Tierra, Baja Fresh, Christina's Italian Ristorante, Hollywood East Café, IHOP, Ledo's Pizza, Legends American Grill & Billiards Tavern, Los Churros, Moby Dick's Seafood & Sushi, Nick's Diner, Pollo Campero, Quiznos, Ruby Tuesday, PJ's Rice Bistro, Dunkin Donuts, Ferdinand's Restaurant, Saigonese Restaurant, Sergio's Place, Pollo Campero
  • Bars/Nightlife: Headliners Comedy Club, Legends, Hollywood Ballroom (Silver Spring)
  • Stores: Giant, Safeway (coming soon), Aeropostale, Aldo, American Eagle, Bath & Body Works, Best Buy, The Children's Place, Forever 21, G by Guess, Hollister Co., JC Penney, Macy's, New York & Co., Nine West, Office Depot, Old Navy, Radio Shack, Target, Victoria's Secret, Safeway
  • Salons/Spas: American Beauty Academy, Eterna Day Spa, Hair Cuttery, JC Penney Salon & Day Spa, MasterCuts, Wheaton Nails & Hair
  • Gyms: Bally Total Fitness, Fitness Twins Exercise Studio, Jazzercise Fitness Center
  • Hotels: Best Western Ambassador Inn, Hilton, Days Inn, Bethesda North Marriott Hotel & Conference Center, Comfort Inn, Sheraton
  • Banks: Bank of America, BB&T Bank, Chevy Chase, Wachovia Bank
  • Theaters: Montgomery Royal Theaters, Regal Majestic, AMC Loews White Flint
  • Museums: National Capital Trolley Museum, Sandy Spring Museum, George Meany Memorial Archives
  • Sport Venues: Northwest Park Golf Course, Wheaton Ice Rink
  • Parks: Brookside Gardens, Wheaton Regional Park, Wheaton Veterans Park, Newport Mill Park, Maryland-Nation Capital Park
  • Trails: Little Amherst, Marathon at the Mall, Triangle Challenge, Valley View Summit, Veirs Mill Stretch-It-Out

Getting Around

  • Metro: Directly above Wheaton Metro Station (Red Line)
  • Bus: Montgomery County Metrobus stops onsite, Greyhound station in Silver Spring
  • Airports: Reagan National, Dulles International
  • Train Station: Silver Spring MARC Station (5 mi.), Amtrak in Rockville (3 mi.)
  • Major Highways/Roads: I-495

Educate Yourself

  • Elementary Schools: Arcola Elementary School, Glenallan Elementary School, Kemp Mill Elementary School
  • Middle Schools: Sligo Middle School, Colonel E. Brooke Lee Middle School
  • High Schools: Wheaton High School, Northwood High School, Albert Einstein High School, Blair High School
  • Colleges/Universities: University of Maryland, George Washington University, George Mason University, Howard University, Catholic University

Feature.Title: MetroPointe
Feature.Description: MetroPointe apartments for rent include modern amenities, urban convenience and contemporary design in beautiful Wheaton, Maryland. Renters are bound to love the property’s stellar location that’s literally right above the Wheaton Metro, making it ideal for commuters. Each spacious home includes GE black appliances, ceramic kitchen tile and wood cabinetry for a luxury feel. This pet-friendly property also features a clubroom, fitness center, business center and landscaped courtyard terraces. There's plenty more to love at the MetroPointe apartments in Maryland.

Feature.Title: Features
Feature.Description:
• Loft and single-story flats
  • Spacious floor plans with 9' ceilings
  • Shaker-style wood cabinetry
  • Contemporary satin nickel hardware throughout
  • Moen faucets throughout
  • GE black appliances
  • Daltile ceramic kitchen tile
  • Convenient package shelf outside resident entry

Amenities

  • Direct access to Wheaton Metro
  • Club room with pool table, plasma TV and catering kitchen
  • Large fitness center
  • Business center with conference area
  • Landscaped courtyard terraces
  • Garage parking with elevator access to residences
  • Walking park
  • Zipcar

Looking for top amenities in a contemporary and luxurious apartment community? Then look no further than MetroPointe in Wheaton, Maryland. The pet-friendly property is right by the Wheaton Metro, making traveling to D.C., Virginia and Maryland a breeze. Top amenities here include a clubroom, fitness center and landscaped courtyard terraces. Contact Bozzuto today to discuss leasing at this incredible community.

Information.OverviewText:
The Paramount, conveniently located in Arlington, VA features spacious and newly renovated apartments with panoramic views of Washington, D.C. and the Potomac River. Enjoy the convenience of living steps from the Crystal City Metro and the walkable neighborhood of Pentagon City shops and restaurants. Your options are endless including the Fashion Center of Pentagon City, Pentagon Row, Costco, Jaleo, Legal Seafood, Morton's The Steakhouse and so much more.

The apartments are newly remodeled featuring beautiful kitchens including birch cabinetry, granite-inspired countertops, wood plank flooring and premium appliances.

Amenities including a stunning rooftop deck with incredible views of DC, plus a club room with bar and cozy fireplace. Also enjoy our 24-hour fitness center with yoga studio and our indoor basketball and racquetball court.

The apartments are newly remodeled featuring beautiful kitchens including birch cabinetry, granite-inspired countertops, wood plank flooring and premium appliances. Amenities including a stunning rooftop deck with incredible views of DC, plus a club room with bar and cozy fireplace. Also enjoy our 24-hour fitness center with yoga studio and our indoor basketball and racquetball court.

Getting Around

  • Airports: Reagan National
  • Major Highways/Roads: Easy access to Rt. 1, I-395 and Rt. 50

Educate Yourself

  • High School: Wakefield High school

Information.OverviewText:
The newly opened Monroe Street Market brings three distinct styles of living to the eclectic Brookland neighborhood in Washington, DC. Discover a unique mix of apartments, the arts and vibrant shops and restaurants at the Brookland-CUA Metro Station. Which style is right for you?

Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons Win Big at This Year’s NAHB Best in American Living Awards

This year, two Bozzuto communities, Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons, won a grand total of three awards at the NAHB Best in American Living Awards (BALA), the nation’s premier award program that recognizes design excellence for the entire residential building industry including single family and multifamily homes communities. The first recognition goes to Monroe Street Market, which was selected as the coveted Multifamily Community of the Year. Additionally, Bozzuto achieved the two top wins in the Urban Mixed Community category for the Platinum and Gold awards for Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons respectively. Congratulations to these amazing developments and all those who worked tirelessly to make them into the award winning communities they are today.
Information.OverviewTextStripped: The newly opened Monroe Street Market brings three distinct styles of living to the eclectic Brookland neighborhood in Washington, DC. Discover a unique mix of apartments, the arts and vibrant shops and restaurants at the Brookland-CUA Metro Station. Which style is right for you? Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons Win Big at This Year’s NAHB Best in American Living Awards This year, two Bozzuto communities, Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons, won a grand total of three awards at the NAHB Best in American Living Awards (BALA), the nation’s premier award program that recognizes design excellence for the entire residential building industry including single family and multifamily homes communities. The first recognition goes to Monroe Street Market, which was selected as the coveted Multifamily Community of the Year. Additionally, Bozzuto achieved the two top wins in the Urban Mixed Community category for the Platinum and Gold awards for Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons respectively. Congratulations to these amazing developments and all those who worked tirelessly to make them into the award winning communities they are today.
Information.OverviewBullet1: Brand new apartments with three unique styles
Information.OverviewBullet2: Adjacent to the Brookland-CUA Red Line Metro
Information.OverviewBullet3: Artist studios and work spaces for events, performances and more
Information.NeighborhoodText:
Live Within Reach

At Monroe Street Market, you're always in the mix. Enjoy easy access to public transportation, including the Brookland-CUA Metro Station, several bus stops, the Metropolitan Bike Trail and plenty of bars and restaurants.

Just Downstairs

  • Potbelly, &pizza, Barnes & Noble, Busboys and Poets, Filter Coffeehouse, The Back Rack, Brookland Pint, Chipotle, Wardman Wines, and Halsa.

Around Town

  • Restaurants: Menomale,Little Ricky's, Brookland's Finest, Steel Plate, San Antonio Bar and Grill, Brookland Café, MGM Roast Beef, Sala Thai, Sweet Mango, The Looking Glass, RedRocks, Murry & Paul's, Cafe Sureia
  • Bars: Smith Public Trust, Steel Plate, Brookland's Finest, The Looking Glass, Lace on the Avenue, Domku Bar & Café, 9:30 Club, Tonic, Marvin, The Gibson, Wonderland Ballroom
  • Stores: Target, CVS, Home Depot, Yes! Organic Market, Giant
  • Hotels: Comfort Inn & Suites
  • Theaters: Dance Place, Howard Theatre, GALA Hispanic Theater
  • Museums: Franciscan Monastery, President Lincoln's Cottage, Pope John Paul II Cultural Center
  • Parks: Fort Bunker Hill Park

Getting Around

  • Metro: At Brookland-CUA Metro Station
  • Bus: Directly across the street from Metrobus station
  • Airports: About eight miles from Reagan National
  • Train Station: About three miles from Union Station

Educate Yourself

  • Elementary School: Brookland Elementary School
  • Middle School: St. Anthony Catholic School
  • High School: Luke Charles Moore Academy
  • Colleges/Universities: Howard University, Trinity Washington University, Catholic University of America

Feature.Title: Monroe Street Market
Feature.Description: Residents of Monroe Street Market in Washington, D.C.’s lively Brookland neighborhood enjoy luxurious homes and a stellar location. The community is near top spots like Trinity Washington University, Basilica of the National Shrine of the Immaculate Conception, and Metropolitan Branch Bike Trail. It’s also right by the Brookland-CUA Red Line Metro, making it ideal for commuters who need to travel to Virginia, Maryland and D.C. This pet-friendly and green property also features top amenities. Guests here enjoy an outdoor swimming pool, on-site retail and dining, outdoor lounges with bars and grills, 24-hour fitness centers, e-café and flexible spaces for private and community events. There's plenty to love about Monroe Street Market - see a complete list of features and amenities below.

Feature.Title: Features
Feature.Description:
• 99 floor plans to suit your personal style
  • Stainless steel ENERGY STAR® appliances
  • Granite countertops in Wave Sand, Giallo Vermont or Rose White
  • Hardwood 42" cabinets available in shaker style or flat panel with brushed nickel hardware
  • Water-saving Moen fixtures
  • Parterre designer wood-style flooring in Lancaster Patina or Natural Hickory
  • Sun-filled spaces with oversized windows and inspiring views
  • Industrial designer pendant lighting
  • Vast closet options; linen closets and pantries available
  • Full-size GE ENERGY STAR® washers and dryers
  • Custom bathrooms with granite countertops, modern stacked tile in bath, soft gray linen texture tile floors and cabinets with drawer storage
  • Pet-friendly community
  • Controlled keyless fob access
  • Wired for Verizon FiOS and Comcast

Green Is In

  • Fully digital, Web-programmable Pepco Energy Wise thermostat
  • Water-saving Moen fixtures
  • GE ENERGY STAR® appliances
  • Low-energy lighting throughout
  • Bike storage
  • Energy-tight building construction that incorporates local materials
  • Recycling and green cleaning program

Optional Features

  • Stained-concrete floors
  • Expanded outdoor living spaces with terraces, balconies and patios
  • Moveable kitchen islands with expanded prep space and extra storage
  • Expanded ceiling heights
  • Tech-friendly, custom built-in desks
  • Direct-entry homes with private entrances

Amenities

Interior Stylings

  • 16,000 sq. ft. of amenity space
  • 24-hour fitness centers with yoga studios, cardio theaters, weights, as well as an express gym
  • Artistic workspaces throughout the community
  • Lounge, community room and billiards
  • E-café with Wi-Fi
  • Flexible spaces for community events and private parties
  • Resident storage available
  • Controlled keyless fob access
  • Pet-friendly community

Outdoor Installations

  • Adjacent to the Brookland-CUA Metro Station and several bus stops
  • Sparkling outdoor swimming pool with expansive sundeck
  • Lush, beautifully landscaped courtyards
  • Outdoor lounges with bars and grills
  • First-floor retail and restaurants
  • Along the Metropolitan Branch Bike Trail
  • Green walls and cool roofs reduce urban heat
  • Garage parking available

Feature.Title: The Arts
Feature.Description:
The Arts Walk

A pedestrian-friendly promenade that celebrates the arts. With art studios on both sides, you may be able to catch glimpses of works in progress — and find the perfect masterpiece at the weekend market.

  • At the center of Brookland Works
  • Lined with artist work studios
  • Weekend farmers and arts markets

Artist Work Studios

Whether you want to draw, paint, print, sculpt, weave or build, you'll finally have the space to express your creativity and exhibit your work in one of the spacious, new work studios at Brookland Works.

  • 27 artist work studios on the first floor of Brookland Works
  • Rear patios open right up to the bike trail
  • Glass garage doors let in lots of natural light
  • Spacious layouts with high ceilings and bathrooms

The Edgewood Arts Building

A uniquely designed, 3,000 sq. ft. dream workspace for artists of all kinds, perfect for big projects and even bigger exhibitions. Meet and mingle, get inspired or create your own masterpiece. Creativity reigns at "The Edge."

  • Designed with floor-to-ceiling windows to let in natural light
  • Pre-wired for flexible lighting and multimedia exhibits
  • Flexible arts and community building for hosted events and art shows

Looking for a plush apartment community that’s in Washington, D.C. hip Brookland neighborhood? Then look no further than Monroe Street Market. This luxurious apartment home is right by the Metro and mere steps away from top restaurants, shops and retail. This green and pet-friendly building also features impressive amenities like on-site retail and dining, outdoor lounges, 24-hour fitness centers and a swimming pool. Don’t wait. Your dream apartment is just a phone call away. Get in touch with Bozzuto today to discuss leasing at this top-notch community.

Information.OverviewText:
The best of urban design has arrived in Odenton, Maryland. Welcome to Flats170 at Academy Yard, where you’ll be greeted with richly appointed interiors, first-class amenities, and eco-friendly touches that will make you feel right at home.

Our central location in Anne Arundel County means you are never far from work or play. We are next door to Fort Meade and the NSA, close to numerous defense and tech companies, and within 30 minutes of Annapolis, Baltimore, and Washington, DC. The MARC train station is less than one mile down the road, and BWI is just 10 minutes away.

Our central location in Anne Arundel County means you are never far from work or play. We are next door to Fort Meade and the NSA, close to numerous defense and tech companies, and within 30 minutes of Annapolis, Baltimore, and Washington, DC. The MARC train station is less than one mile down the road, and BWI is just 10 minutes away.
Information.OverviewBullet1: Brand new apartments with unparalleled amenities - Move in now!
Information.OverviewBullet2: Contemporary apartment finishes including granite counters and stainless steel appliances
Information.OverviewBullet3: Convenient location to Route 170 and 32 & less than 30-minutes to Washington DC and Baltimore
Information.NeighborhoodText:
Paint the Town

  • Restaurants: Starbuck’s, Houlihan’s Restaurant & Bar, Rinconcito Mexicano, Four Seasons Grill, Five Guys, Express Pit Beef, Hunan Rose, Three Brothers, Chipotle, Bonefish Grill, Coal Fire Grill, Fuji Japanese Steakhouse, Dairy Queen, Qdoba Mexican Grill, Panera Bread, Genghis Grill, Elevation Burger, Red Robin, Joe's Crab Shack, Olive Garden, Prime Rib, The Cheesecake Factory, Crab Galley
  • Shopping: Wegmans, Giant, Food Lion, Weis, Safeway, Target, Bed Bath & Beyond, ULTA Beauty, Arundel Mills, Columbia Mall, Odenton Town Center
  • Parks & Recreation: Odenton Recreation Park, Quail Run Dog Park, Meade Village Park

  • Banks: M&T, BB&T, Bank of America, PNC Bank, Suntrust, First National Bank, The Columbia Bank

Getting Around

  • Metro: New Carrollton
  • Train: Odenton Marc Train Station
  • Airports: Baltimore Washington International
  • Major Highways/Roads: Crain Hwy/Route 3, Route 32, Route 100, Interstate-95, Baltimore Washington Parkway

Educate Yourself

  • Middle School: Arundel Middle School
  • High School: Arundel High School

Feature.Title: Flats170 at Academy Yard
Feature.Description: Flats170 at Academy Yard promise luxury, eco-friendly apartments bursting with amenities. These premium apartments include private balconies, nine-foot ceilings, granite countertops, a swimming pool, fitness center complete with yoga, kickboxing and CrossFit studios, a cinema-quality movie theater in addition to a large central courtyard with grilling stations and a business center with a cyber café. And then there’s the location. The Odenton, Maryland, property is in the heart of Anne Arundel County. The MARC train station is less than a mile away, the New Carrollton metro is nearby and the community is right by major highways in the region—making it ideal for commuters. Fort Meade is a quick drive away and Flats170 also offers special programs for military employees. The community is also centrally located in a great school district.. Discover more amenities available by reading below.

Feature.Title: Amenities
Feature.Description:
• South Beach-inspired pool & sundeck overlook clubroom lounge and bar
  • Resort-Style Lobby and Lounge
  • Clubroom with Bar & Billiards
  • Fitness center with yoga room
  • Kickboxing and cross fit studio
  • Business center & cyber cafe including e-lounge and conference room
  • Cinema-quality movie theater
  • Large central courtyard with grilling stations
  • Parks, exercise trail, dog park & wooded stream
  • Private storage available
  • Bike storage areas and self-serve bike repair shop
  • MARC train just under a mile away

Features

  • Spacious open floor plans - 25 different layouts
  • 9-foot ceilings in all homes
  • 2-story loft (up to 18-foot ceilings) apartments available
  • Luxurious granite countertops
  • Stainless steel appliances with gas range
  • Brushed nickel hardware throughout with chrome in baths
  • Wide rail, shaker-style maple cabinets with espresso finish
  • Linen Kola tile in kitchen, foyer and baths
  • Modern fixtures in kitchen and bath, including pull-out kitchen faucet
  • Modern tile tub surrounds and curved shower bars
  • Expansive windows
  • Undermount sink
  • Custom concrete and stainless steel shelving at entry
  • Energy-efficient designer lighting
  • Private balconies
  • Private garages available
  • Pet Friendly

Feature.Title: Green Features
Feature.Description:
Energy and Water Efficiency

  • Highly-efficient HVAC systems to cut down utility usage (and bills!) by more than 15%
  • High-efficiency dual-flush toilets, showerheads and faucets to reduce approximately 40% of water consumption
  • ENERGY STAR® Certified appliances
  • Low-energy lighting
  • Each residence is well insulated and sealed for thermal comfort

Indoor Environmental Quality

  • 100% Smoke-free community
  • Low VOC paints, adhesives, and carpet for a healthy living environment
  • Apartment home doors are air-sealed to outside and neighboring homes
  • Additional insulation and caulking to better seal building for energy efficiency and sound purposes
  • Natural ventilation from outside bringing controlled fresh into your apartment home

Sustainable Site

  • The project is built with over 75% of recycled and regionally sourced materials
  • Over 90% of construction waste has been diverted from landfills
  • Easy access to MARC station and CMRT K route bus
  • Ecologically balanced landscaping with high-efficiency irrigation
  • Radon-resistant construction elements

Green Community features

  • Designed to achieve LEED® Silver certification
  • Recycling program
  • Bike storage to promote eco-friendly transportation
  • Use of green cleaning products

The property’s central location means restaurants, offices and even outdoor trails are all at just steps outside your door. Flats 170 also offers its residents unmatched amenities including a dog park, contemporary design and cutting-edge appliances. If you’re searching for a luxurious and eco-friendly home to call your own, please contact Bozzuto today to start leasing.

Rooftop amenities including an infinity pool, dog park, lounge and fire pits. And with rock-star amenities like these, what's not to love about City Market at O Street?

Feature.Title: City Market at O
Feature.Description: City Market at O Street in Northwest Washington, D.C. is where renters go to live in style. Walk to the Mount Vernon Square Metro or go to Union Station to access the rest of the city. Top amenities at this pet-friendly property include a top-of-the-line fitness center, game room, rooftop pool, concierge services, rooftop dog park and grooming station. Each home here also offers distinctive finishes with modern flair, sleek bathrooms, fully equipped kitchens and customizable closets. See what other features are in store for you at City Market at O apartments from Bozzuto below.

Washington, D.C residents will love The City Market at O Street in Northwest. Their dogs will love this pet-friendly community. Its stellar location is only topped by the community’s luxurious amenities. Residents will enjoy the rooftop pool, concierge services, dog park and game room too. Don’t delay. Reach out to Bozzuto today to secure a spot at this great community.

Information.OverviewText:
Brand new apartments in the heart of Washington, DC's legendary Shaw neighborhood. Located right next to the Shaw-Howard U Metro and right above the neighborhood's new favorite places to eat, drink, and socialize at Progression Place.

The highly anticipated 7th Flats Apartments at Progression Place blends the best of modern upscale living with the rich history of the Shaw community. From studios outfitted with the latest features to eclectic one bedroom homes with sweeping views of DC's skyline to historical two bedrooms with the building's original exposed brick walls, there's a place for everyone to call home at 7th Flats.

Top amenities at this pet-friendly building include on-site retail, concierge services, fitness center, rooftop terrace, WiFi cafe, onsite parking, 24/7 concierge and business center with Mac and PC computers. Information.OverviewText: The Palatine features beautifully designed apartments with upscale finishes and luxury amenities to make you feel at home. Ideally located in Arlington, VA, with close proximity to major DC landmarks and just a few blocks from the Courthouse Metro station, The Palatine offers easy access to high-end shopping, notable restaurants and entertainment. The wonderful balance of nearby office, retail and hotel options coupled with a successful blend of urban sophistication and neighborhood charm foster a thriving and energetic lifestyle in a highly sought after location to live, work and play.

The wonderful balance of nearby office, retail and hotel options coupled with a successful blend of urban sophistication and neighborhood charm foster a thriving and energetic lifestyle in a highly sought after location to live, work and play.
Information.OverviewBullet1: Located in the heart of Arlington, only 2 blocks from the Courthouse Metro
Information.OverviewBullet2: Breathtaking Views of Arlington, Washington DC and the monument

Information.NeighborhoodText:
Paint the Town

Here at The Palatine you are just steps from an array of shopping, dining and entertainment options. You’ll appreciate our convenient location with access to the Clarendon, Courthouse and Rosslyn Metro stations, as well as our close proximity to major employers in downtown Washington D.C., Georgetown, Arlington and Rosslyn. Catch a movie, dine at one of many nearby restaurants, or spend the afternoon shopping in the neighborhood at destinations such as Ballston Common Mall. At the end of the day, relax and unwind by enjoying one of the area’s many nightlife venues. Make The Palatine your home, and find yourself at the center of it all.

  • Restaurants/Bars: Bayou Bakery, Clarendon Ballroom, Ireland’s Four Courts, Liberty Tavern, Ragtime, Ray’s the Steaks, Spider Kelly’s, Whitlows on Wilson, Cheesecake Factory, La Tasca, Tandoori Nights, Mister Day's Bar & Grill, Baja Fresh, Hard Times Café
  • Shopping:Ballston Common Mall, CVS, Market Common Clarendon, Safeway, Whole Foods, Georgetown Valet, Pottery Barn, Williams-Sonoma, Apple Store, Free People, Chico's, Origins, Ann Taylor Loft, Barnes & Noble, Eastern Mountain Sports, Jos. A. Bank, Crate & Barrel, Container Store, Orvis, The Papery, T-Mobile, Lulelemon Athletica, Red Mango, MyEyeDr., Ethan Allen, Palm Beach Tan, South Moon Under, Gold's Gym, Washington Sports Club, Ann Taylor
  • Entertainment: AMC Courthouse Theater, Arlington National Cemetery, Dog Park, Freedom Park (Marine Corp Memorial), Kennedy Center
  • Sport Venues: Verizon Center, Nationals Park

Getting Around

  • Metro: Courthouse Metro (Orange Line) two blocks from building
  • Airport: Reagan National
  • Train: Union Station
  • Highways: Quick access to I-66, I-395, I-495

Educate Yourself

  • Elementary School: Key Elementary School, Arlington Science Focus
  • Middle School: Jefferson Middle School
  • High School: Washington Lee High School
  • Colleges/Universities: Marymount University

Feature.Title: The Palatine Apartments
Feature.Description: The Palatine Apartments offer residents a high-end apartment community in one of Arlington, Virginia’s best neighborhood. This property is just a few blocks from the Courthouse Metro Station—giving renters access to top sites like the Verizon Center and other key Washington, D.C. sites—and right by popular spots like the Ballston Common Mall and Marymount University. Its proximity to I-66 makes it an ideal place for commuters to call home and access Virginia, Maryland and the District. Each spacious home at the Palatine features oversized soaking tubs, Energy Star stainless steel appliances and large walk-in closets. The community includes a rooftop pool with sundeck, fitness center and breathtaking views of Arlington, Washington, D.C. and the National Monument. Read on for the complete list of modern amenities and features that await you at The Palatine Apartments.

Feature.Title: Features
Feature.Description:
• Energy Star stainless steel appliances
  • Floor-to-ceiling windows available
  • Low-E glass windows
  • Breathtaking views of Arlington, Washington DC and the monuments
  • Oversized soaking tubs
  • Balcony/Patio available
  • Granite countertops
  • Large walk-in closets

Amenities

  • Resident Lounge great for entertaining or just relaxing
  • Fitness Club with cardio equipment and free weights
  • Garage Parking
  • Easy access to the Courthouse Metro
  • Pet friendly
  • Controlled access building
  • Pool and sundeck
  • Private, landscaped courtyard

Renters searching for a luxurious home in a great location in Arlington, Virginia should consider calling The Palatine Apartments home. Residents here are just a few blocks from the Courthouse Metro Station and near I-66, making it an ideal spot for commuters. The top amenities at Palatine include a rooftop pool, fitness center and stunning views of Arlington and Washington, D.C. Contact Bozzuto today to discuss leasing a home at this stellar community.
